title: Business Facilitation Center to be completed by September 2024: Minister told
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP): The Business Facilitation Center, a project to streamlining investment processes, is expected to be completed by September this year, CDA Chairman Muhammad Ali Randhawa told Federal Minister for Board of Investment (BOI), Abdul Aleem Khan on Friday.
CDA Chairman briefed the minister about ongoing work to the project, stating that the facility will provide investors with all necessary services under one roof, making it an attractive destination for both local and foreign investors.
Minister Aleem emphasized the importance of creating a corporate culture-friendly environment, which Chairman Randhawa assured would be achieved through the center’s design.
The center’s construction is being carried out around the clock, with the BOI and CDA collaborating to ensure its success.
The BOI will provide the necessary manpower and hardware, while the CDA will complete the construction work.
The Business Facilitation Center is poised to revolutionize investment in Islamabad, making it an ideal location for businesses to thrive. Its completion is eagerly anticipated by investors and stakeholders alike.
